name: Cube Rush (tausif-sama)
description:
Cube Rush is an endless runner arcade game based on the Unity game engine. Control the vibrant orange cube and evade obstacles to win. If you hit any of the grey obstacles you die. Cube Rush is a PC game with touch screen support. So you can use either use your A and D keys to go left and right and Space to jump or use can use a touchscreen if it's available.

There are different music tracks which play at random everytime you play. There're a set of chill lo-fi beats, some great guitar instrumantals and some other cool soundtracks. The music used were all copyright free and were sourced from artists like Prod. Riddiman. So yeah, chill, relax and enjoy the game while you rush though obstacles and lead the radiant orange cube to victorty. Glhf!
